comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Presumably this is en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Augusta_Viktoria_of_Schleswig-Holstein But she looks a bit younger here, than the 1913 picture on the Wikipedia page. Here's another Bain photo that does show a similar face, but again the photo above looks younger: I find myself wondering if this is another case of Bain using an old photo when they didn't have a current one.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: swanq, I compared this photo with others of Empress Augusta Victoria, and I think you are right. I'll suggest the change to our catalogers. You can see on the right edge that this was a photo Bain got then made a negative of, so the original date could have been anytime.  When you look at the background just in front of the horse it looks like some editing was done to this image. I think the image of the Empress and the horse was cut out and placed a different background.
